concept.title: Object Storage
concept.shortdesc: Eucalyptus supports Walrus and Riak as its object storage backend. There is no extra planning if you use Walrus. If you use Riak, you can use a single Riak cluster for several Eucalptus clouds. Basho recommends five nodes for each Riak cluster. This also means that you have to set up and configure a load balancer between the Riak nodes and the object storage gateway (OSG).
